nodes.text: Nik Sant, or "Gramps" as he was affectionately known, was a Lieutenant and survival expert of the Rebel Alliance strike team sent to the forest moon of Endor.

The oldest member of the team, "Gramps" was a survival expert. Sant was a leading member of a group of soldiers who, in the beginning of the Galactic Civil War, devised plans for the Rebellion's guerrilla-like attacks and key targets in the Galactic Empire.

He also helped assemble the Endor strike team. When an Ewok stole a speeder bike, three scout troopers followed, leaving one at the shield generator. The Rebels captured the scout, and Nik Sant disguised himself by putting on the scout trooper armor. Unfortunately, he was later captured by the Imperials, and was held hostage along with the other members of the strike team.
Nik Sant was an old man with a big white beard, he was a lieutenant of the team Endor Strike and a survival specialist.
During his service with the Endor strike team, Nik Sant wore the forest camouflage gear of the team's members. He was armed with an A280 blaster rifle and a military backpack.

Nik Sant appeared briefly as a member of Han Solo's strike team in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He was first identified as Nik Sant in The Official Star Wars Fact File 44 in 2002. According to a continuity polaroid from Return of the Jedi, he was portrayed by one "L. Burner."
